txt.en: 'My initial examination of the crystal you brought me is troubling, [placeholder]. We need to learn more, but I require a larger amount to study.\n\n'I have heard tell of more of these fell stones in the Warg camp, Howlers' Notch. Bring me what you find, that we might uncover their secrets.'
Mother Amma is in the forge of Annâk-khurfu.\n\nGunvald has asked you to give his thanks to Mother Amma.
'That Gunvald is a solid rock. Always has the proper amount of courtesy.'
The chest is located near the forge at Annâk-khurfu.\n\nMother Amma has asked you to place the foul smelling crystals in a chest.
Howlers' Notch is north-west of Annâk-khurfu.\n\nMother Amma has asked you to collect more of the fell crystals.
Talk to Gunvald
Return to Mother Amma
Collected strange crystals ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Stash those crystals before we all expire from the stench!'

'Ugh. I thought I was accustomed to the stench of these rocks by now, but with so many in one place it is nearly overwhelming.

'Ah, yes. These stones hold even more of the corruption than the first you brought hither. I suppose that explains the... enhanced smell.

'Put them into that chest there, will you? That should help keep the fumes contained while I study each one.'
Put the crystals into the chest
Talk to Mother Amma
DNT - Put the crystals into the chest
Mother Amma needs more crystals to study.
Put the crystals into the chest

'Whew! Thank you, [placeholder]. That was worse than sour sulfur.\n\n'I shall need some time to examine the crystals you brought. Go now and tell Gunvald to keep his scouts away from these abominations, then return to me.'
Mother Amma is in the forge at Annâk-khurfu.\n\nYou should talk to Mother Amma.
'Have you found any more crystals for me yet?'
'I was wondering what that smell was. Thank you for the information, [placeholder]. I will let my scouts know to give these crystals a wide berth. Please thank Mother Amma for me.'
Gunvald is in Annâk-khurfu.\n\nMother Amma has asked you to pass a message along to Gunvald.
Mother Amma is in the forge at Annâk-khurfu, in southern Elderslade.\n\nYou should bring the crystals to Mother Amma.
Talk to Mother Amma
Collect strange crystals ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Corrupted Crystals
